name: Dungeon Crawl (Naityvee)
description:
Dungeon Crawl is a game I want to develop and will use this page to continuously upload new additions to the game as I learn Game Development and create a good game play loop for the game.

The basic idea is to have a dark dungeon crawling experience in first person, with punishing combat, a wide array of bosses in special dungeon rooms, showers of loot and a customizable character / player base area in the dungeon.
